Terrace - hours and Class E use
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 09 August 2023 (RN: 22/05984/FULL) for, 'External works including the creation of external terraces at rear first floor level and roof level in association with the office (Class E) use, installation of balustrading at roof level, extension of existing stair housing and stair to roof level, removal of existing roof lights, facade and stonework cleaning and repair, ironwork repair and redecoration, installation of new railing at ground floor level, installation of louvred plant enclosure at roof level and other associated works'; NAMELY, to allow replacement of roof light with Automatic Opening Vent (AOV) on the stair overrun; adjustment to the roof form of the stair overrun; alteration to the size of the stair overrun; alteration to the stair overrun tile pattern; and intercom system and replacement steps. (Linked with 24/07549/LBC) (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
